name: get_business_profile_data
description: Get profile data of a TikTok account, including analytics and insights.

access_token.description: Access token authorized by TikTok creators.

business_id.description: Application specific unique identifier for the TikTok account.

start_date.description: Query start date in YYYY-MM-DD format. Defaults to None.

end_date.description: Query end date in YYYY-MM-DD format. Defaults to None.

fields.description:
List of requested fields to include in the response. Defaults to None.
- username
- display_name
- profile
- analytics
- settings

name: get_business_publish_status
description:
Get the publishing status of a TikTok video or photo post.

This endpoint allows you to check the current status of a post publishing task,
including whether it has completed successfully or is still in progress.

access_token.description: Access token authorized by TikTok creators.

business_id.description: Application specific unique identifier for the TikTok account.

publish_id.description: Unique identifier for a post publishing task.

name: publish_business_video
description:
Publish a public video post to a TikTok account.

This endpoint allows you to upload and publish a video to your TikTok account with various
customization options for the post's visibility and interaction settings.

access_token.description: Access token authorized by TikTok creators.

business_id.description: Application specific unique identifier for the TikTok account.

video_url.description: URL of the video to be published.

tags.description: List of tags for the video.

thumbnail_url.description: URL of the thumbnail for the video.

thumbnail_offset.description: Time offset in seconds for video thumbnail.

caption.description: Caption text for the video. Defaults to None.

is_brand_organic.description: Whether the post is organic branded content. Defaults to False.

is_branded_content.description: Whether the post is branded content. Defaults to False.

disable_comment.description: Whether to disable comments. Defaults to False.

disable_duet.description: Whether to disable duet feature. Defaults to False.

disable_stitch.description: Whether to disable stitch feature. Defaults to False.

thumbnail_offset.description: Time offset in seconds for video thumbnail. Defaults to 0.

is_ai_generated.description: Whether the content is AI-generated. Defaults to False.

upload_to_draft.description: Whether to save as draft instead of publishing. Defaults to False.
